casebody.data:
Eric DENNEY, and wife Christine Denney
v.
WARDSON CONSTRUCTION, INC., and Healthy Home Insulation, LLC No. 132P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 George B. Currin, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Wardson Construction, Inc. L. Lamar Armstrong, Jr., Attorney at Law, Smithfield, for Denney, Eric, et al. L. Lamar Armstrong III, Attorney at Law, for Denney, Eric, et al. Matthew D. Quinn, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Wardson Construction, Inc.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 12th of April 2019 by Defendant (Wardson Construction, Inc.) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."

Davis, J. recused
